entry.title: Prevent Command Prompt's Auto Close
entry.content:
{% include JB/setup %}

As I want to start a specific task of a rake script with a double-click in windows I had to created a batch file to start the task: {% highlight PowerShell %} rake -f rakefile.rb task_name {% endhighlight %} Either if the task fails or not the command window will close.

To solve this you have to add pause and call the rake script. As I’m just interested in the output in case of an error I check the errorlevel for it. {% highlight PowerShell %} call rake -f rakefile.rb unit_tests if %ERRORLEVEL% == 1 (

pause

) {% endhighlight %}
